EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Opportunity for NCS Graduates - The Skills Show
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
There is an exclusive opportunity for a limited number of young people who have undertaken NCS to attend a VIP visit to The Skills Show at the National Exhibition Centre (NEC). If you are interested then read on......
The Skills Show Late event is an exclusive evening on Thursday 13th November. This is a 2 hour session from 5pm â€“ 7pm at the NEC where you and others will have unlimited and exclusive access to one of the halls and all the activities taking place in there. This is an invitation only open evening where you will have the chance to exclusively enjoy all that is going on in one of our halls. The activity in the hall will include free and impartial careers advice, alongside the very best of the skills show but in a more intimate environment. All of our premiere colleges and employers will have an interactive presence and be on hand to talk to you about potential future, training and employment. If you enjoy the evening we will provide you, friends and family with complimentary tickets to attend the Saturday show and you will be invited to the big celebration evening which includes our medal presentations.
Watch the film
There are a limited number of VIP passes for this event available for young people who have completed NCS. If you would like to attend then email tom.haigh@the-challenge.org with the reasons why you would like to go, by 9pm Sunday 9th November. We look forward to hearing from you.
